summary: This is a piece of armor that i ve created in 3ds max which is basically created with crystals
descriptionHtml:
This is a piece of armor that i ve created in 3ds max but infortunately I cant wear it in game since I couldnt give to the armor a skeloton 
so I request that if there is anyone that likes enough the armor and can make it wearable in game please contact me(in discussion board) and give me a photo while in game wearing the armour and the armour file for my mail that i ll give later
author: silvermodder
